answers.answer: I went through that with my 1st and 2nd pregnancy.  ANd Yes the 3 hour one came back fine. Unfortunately, with this baby my glocuse was sooo high (249) that they went ahead and diagnosed me with GD.  I think you'll be ok.  Just try not to eat sweets and a lot of starches the day before your test. =)
I luckily didnt need the 3 hr test but i heard most ppl fail the 1 hr and are fine when the results are back from the 3 hr
my last two pregnancies both had the 1 hour come back high and the 3 hours came back normal.  Try not to worry about it right now.

Hi.  Mine came back 165.  I had my three hour and passed with flying colors.  I understand that there are alot of people who fail the initial one hour but pass the htree hour.  Good luck, everything will  be fine!
Many people have a high 1 hour and a normal 3 hour.  Hopefully, you will too.

Thanks everyone.  I was pretty shook up when I got off the phone with the dr office, but I am feeling much calmer after hearing about others positive outcome.  Thanks for the support and quick response.
My 1st pregnancy I had a high 1 hour and a normal 3 hour and with my 2nd pregnancy I had high results for both. I had  was and insulin-dependant gestational diabetic.

question: My one hour glucose test for gestational diabetes came back at HIGH at 169.  The normal range is 65 to 139.  They've asked me to come back for a 3 hour test.I'm worried.  Has anybody had a one hour test come back high and a three hour test come back normal?Thanks, Hannah
title: High glucose test results - WORRIED
